text: Por maaŋ mbuav kim, Sairas gu Timoti Masedonia ŋgu bakɨme thav zergim, Por mbaram wo mbui ŋaari mbari, ana za nta thav, ana rari tugɨratɨgap zazera Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai. Ana khaŋ tɨga havhargiap, khaŋ Zudaiŋ ga nzuai, “Zisas ana Fhe Bakɨme taagip wo gumgi gu mbigi ndɨr zav suaŋgiap farasarigi guma ma.”
